requirements.summary: Add a visible shiny silver/chrome espresso machine prop on top of the counter in the always-rendered fallback room scene.
acceptanceCriteria: In the default rendered scene (the basic fallback room), a coffee/espresso machine mesh is present on the counter surface (on top of the counter, not intersecting the counter body).
The coffee/espresso machine renders with a shiny silver/chrome look (high metalness, low roughness) consistent with the existing machine styling.
The prop casts/receives shadows consistently with the other countertop props (when shadows are enabled in the scene).

file_operations.description: Add an espresso machine prop group to the fallback countertop props, using meshStandardMaterial configured for a chrome look (high metalness, low roughness), and ensure meshes have castShadow/receiveShadow set consistently with existing props.

requirements.summary: Position the fallback espresso machine so it aligns with the counter group (z aligned to the counter at z = -5), avoids overlapping existing fallback props, and is visible from the default camera view.
acceptanceCriteria: The coffee/espresso machine is placed at a stable position on the counter top in the fallback scene and is not visually colliding with the fallback cups/to-go cups/syrup bottles.
The coffee/espresso machine remains visible from the default camera starting view without requiring navigation.

file_operations.description: Set the espresso machine group's position so its z aligns with the counter placement (z = -5) while choosing x/z offsets that avoid the existing fallback prop clusters (cups/to-go cups/syrup bottles) and keep it in view from the default camera start.
